00050 static const unsigned int HELP_MARGIN = 2;
00051 static const unsigned int HELP_OFFSET = 15;
00052 static const unsigned int HISTORY_PAGE = 5;
00053 static const unsigned int HISTORY_STACK_SIZE = 100;
00054 
00056 #define TRACE_SHELL GetShellTraceClass()
00058 static const TraceClass& GetShellTraceClass(void)
00059 {
00060     static const TraceClass cli_ShellTraceClass("CLI_SHELL", Help()
00061         .AddHelp(Help::LANG_EN, "Shell traces")
00062         .AddHelp(Help::LANG_FR, "Traces du shell"));
00063     return cli_ShellTraceClass;
00064 }

00066 
00067 Shell::Shell(const Cli& CLI_Cli)
00068   : m_pcliCli(& CLI_Cli), m_pcliInput(NULL),
00069     m_eLang(Help::LANG_EN), m_bBeep(true),
00070     m_qMenus(MAX_MENU_PER_CLI),
00071     m_cliCmdLine(* new CmdLineEdition()),
00072     m_cliHistory(* new CmdLineHistory(HISTORY_STACK_SIZE)),
00073     m_eThreadSafeCmd(THREAD_SAFE_NONE),
00074     m_bRestoreTracesOnFinish(false)
00075 {
00076     EnsureCommonDevices();
00077     EnsureTraces();
00078 
00079     for (int i=0; i<STREAM_TYPES_COUNT; i++)
00080     {
00081         m_artStream[i].pcliStream = NULL;
00082         m_artStream[i].bEnable = true;
00083     }
00084 
00085     if (! m_qMenus.AddHead(& CLI_Cli))
00086     {
00087         GetTraces().Trace(INTERNAL_ERROR) << "Could not set initial shell status." << endl;
00088     }
00089     CLI_Cli.SetShell(*this);
00090 
00091     GetTraces().Trace(TRACE_SHELL) << "New shell for CLI '" << GetCli().GetKeyword() << "'." << endl;
00092 }
00093 
00094 Shell::~Shell(void)
00095 {
00096     GetTraces().Trace(TRACE_SHELL) << "Shell deleted for CLI '" << GetCli().GetKeyword() << "'." << endl;
00097 
00098     if (m_pcliInput != NULL)
00099     {
00100         m_pcliInput->FreeInstance(__CALL_INFO__);
00101         m_pcliInput = NULL;
00102     }
00103 
00104     for (int i=0; i<STREAM_TYPES_COUNT; i++)
00105     {
00106         if (m_artStream[i].pcliStream != NULL)
00107         {
00108             m_artStream[i].pcliStream->FreeInstance(__CALL_INFO__);
00109             m_artStream[i].pcliStream = NULL;
00110         }
00111     }
00112 
00113     delete & m_cliCmdLine;
00114     delete & m_cliHistory;
00115 }

00119     CLI_ASSERT(m_pcliCli != NULL);
00120     return *m_pcliCli;

00123 const IODevice& Shell::GetInput(void) const
00124 {
00125     if (m_pcliInput != NULL)
00126     {
00127         return *m_pcliInput;
00128     }
00129     else
00130     {
00131         return IODevice::GetStdIn();
00132     }

00134 
00135 const OutputDevice& Shell::GetStream(const STREAM_TYPE E_StreamType) const
00136 {
00137     if ((E_StreamType >= 0) && (E_StreamType < STREAM_TYPES_COUNT))
00138     {
00139         if (m_artStream[E_StreamType].bEnable)
00140         {
00141             // This is a hack to have IOMux multiplexing output correctly.
00142             const OutputDevice* pcli_Stream = m_artStream[E_StreamType].pcliStream;
00143             while (const IOMux* const pcli_IOMux = dynamic_cast<const IOMux*>(pcli_Stream))
00144             {
00145                 pcli_Stream = & pcli_IOMux->GetOutput(E_StreamType);
00146             }
00147 
00148             if (pcli_Stream != NULL)
00149             {
00150                 return *pcli_Stream;
00151             }
00152         }
00153     }
00154     else
00155     {
00156         CLI_ASSERT(false);
00157     }
00158 
00159     // Default to null device.
00160     return OutputDevice::GetNullDevice();
00161 }
00162 
00163 const bool Shell::SetStream(const STREAM_TYPE E_StreamType, OutputDevice& CLI_Stream)
00164 {
00165     if ((E_StreamType < 0) || (E_StreamType >= STREAM_TYPES_COUNT))
00166     {
00167         CLI_ASSERT(false);
00168         return false;
00169     }
00170     else
00171     {
00172         // Free previous reference.
00173         if (OutputDevice* const pcli_Stream = m_artStream[E_StreamType].pcliStream)
00174         {
00175             bool b_Res = true;
00176 
00177             // Unreference the device right now.
00178             m_artStream[E_StreamType].pcliStream = NULL;
00179             if (IsRunning())
00180             {
00181                 if (! pcli_Stream->CloseDown(__CALL_INFO__))
00182                 {
00183                     PrintError(ResourceString(), pcli_Stream->GetLastError());
00184                     b_Res = false;
00185                 }
00186             }
00187             pcli_Stream->FreeInstance(__CALL_INFO__);
00188 
00189             if (! b_Res)
00190             {
00191                 // Abort on error.
00192                 return false;
00193             }
00194         }
00195 
00196         // Store next reference.
00197         {
00198             CLI_Stream.UseInstance(__CALL_INFO__);
00199             if (IsRunning())
00200             {
00201                 if (! CLI_Stream.OpenUp(__CALL_INFO__))
00202                 {
00203                     // Store nothing on error.
00204                     PrintError(ResourceString(), CLI_Stream.GetLastError());
00205                     CLI_Stream.FreeInstance(__CALL_INFO__);
00206                     return false;
00207                 }
00208             }
00209             // Do not store the reference until opening is done.
00210             m_artStream[E_StreamType].pcliStream = & CLI_Stream;
00211         }
00212 
00213         return true;
00214     }
00215 }
00216 
00217 const bool Shell::StreamEnabled(const STREAM_TYPE E_StreamType) const
00218 {
00219     if ((E_StreamType < 0) || (E_StreamType >= STREAM_TYPES_COUNT))
00220     {
00221         CLI_ASSERT(false);
00222         return false;
00223     }
00224     else
00225     {
00226         return m_artStream[E_StreamType].bEnable;
00227     }
00228 }

00230 const bool Shell::EnableStream(const STREAM_TYPE E_StreamType, const bool B_Enable)
00231 {
00232     if ((E_StreamType < 0) || (E_StreamType >= STREAM_TYPES_COUNT))
00233     {
00234         CLI_ASSERT(false);
00235         return false;
00236     }
00237     else
00238     {
00239         m_artStream[E_StreamType].bEnable = B_Enable;
00240         return true;
00241     }
00242 }

00285 
00286 void Shell::Run(IODevice& CLI_IODevice)
00287 {
00288     if (StartExecution(CLI_IODevice))
00289     {
00290         if (MonoThreadDevice* const pcli_MTDevice = dynamic_cast<MonoThreadDevice*>(m_pcliInput))
00291         {
00292             // Simply attach the shell and wait for characters to be input.
00293             pcli_MTDevice->AttachShell(*this);
00294         }
00295         else
00296         {
00297             MainLoop();
00298             FinishExecution();
00299         }
00300     }
00301     else
00302     {
00303         FinishExecution();
00304     }
00305 }
00306 
00307 const bool Shell::StartExecution(IODevice& CLI_IODevice)
00308 {
00309     GetTraces().Trace(TRACE_SHELL) << "Shell for CLI '" << GetCli().GetKeyword() << "' starts running." << endl;
00310     // Open devices.
00311     if (OpenDevices(CLI_IODevice))
00312     {
00313         // Trace device management.
00314         m_bRestoreTracesOnFinish = false;
00315         if (! GetTraces().IsStreamSet())
00316         {
00317             GetTraces().SetStream(CLI_IODevice);
00318             m_bRestoreTracesOnFinish = true;
00319         }
00320 
00321         // Check the CLI is the first menu.
00322         if ((m_pcliCli != NULL) && (m_qMenus.GetHead() == m_pcliCli))
00323         {
00324             // Enter the shell.
00325             PromptWelcomeMessage();
00326             PromptMenu();
00327 
00328             return true;
00329         }
00330     }
00331 
00332     return false;
00333 }
00334 
00335 void Shell::MainLoop(void)
00336 {
00337     // While there are menus in the menu stack, it means we are still waiting for command lines.
00338     while (! m_qMenus.IsEmpty())
00339     {
00340         bool b_QuitShell = true;
00341 
00342         if ((m_eThreadSafeCmd != THREAD_SAFE_QUIT)      // Thread safe processing.
00343             && (m_pcliInput != NULL))
00344         {
00345             // Get an input key.
00346             const KEY e_Key = m_pcliInput->GetKey();
00347 
00348             if ((m_eThreadSafeCmd != THREAD_SAFE_QUIT)  // Thread safe processing.
00349                 && (e_Key != NULL_KEY))                 // End of input.
00350             {
00351                 // Process the input key.
00352                 OnKey(e_Key);
00353                 b_QuitShell = false;
00354             }
00355         }
00356 
00357         if (b_QuitShell)
00358         {
00359             Quit();
00360         }
00361     }
00362 }
00363 
00364 void Shell::OnMonoThreadKey(MonoThreadDevice& CLI_Source, const KEY E_KeyCode)
00365 {
00366     bool b_QuitShell = true;
00367 
00368     if ((! m_qMenus.IsEmpty())                      // Menu stack control.
00369                                                     // If there are menus in the menu stack,
00370                                                     // it means we are still waiting for command lines.
00371         && (m_eThreadSafeCmd != THREAD_SAFE_QUIT)   // Thread safe processing (should be useless in mono-thread).
00372         && (E_KeyCode != NULL_KEY)                  // End of input.
00373         && (& CLI_Source == m_pcliInput))           // Input source control.
00374     {
00375         // Process the input key.
00376         OnKey(E_KeyCode);
00377         b_QuitShell = false;
00378     }
00379 
00380     // Possibly quit the shell depending on the input.
00381     if (b_QuitShell)
00382     {
00383         // Let's quit the shell.
00384         Quit();
00385     }
00386 
00387     // Eventually finish execution if needed.
00388     if (m_qMenus.IsEmpty()                          // Menu stack control.
00389                                                     // If there are no menus left in the menu stack,
00390                                                     // it means the thing is done.
00391         || (m_eThreadSafeCmd == THREAD_SAFE_QUIT))  // Thread safe processing (should be useless in mono-thread).
00392     {
00393         // Detach the shell of the mono-thread device.
00394         CLI_Source.DetachShell(*this);
00395         // Finish execution.
00396         FinishExecution();
00397     }
00398 }
00399 
00400 const bool Shell::FinishExecution(void)
00401 {
00402     bool b_Res = true;
00403 
00404     // Leave the shell.
00405     PromptByeMessage();
00406 
00407     // Restore the CLI reference.
00408     if (! m_qMenus.AddTail(m_pcliCli))
00409     {
00410         GetTraces().Trace(INTERNAL_ERROR) << "Could not restore a valid status on shell exit." << endl;
00411         b_Res = false;
00412     }
00413 
00414     // Trace device management.
00415     if (m_bRestoreTracesOnFinish)
00416     {
00417         if (! GetTraces().UnsetStream())
00418         {
00419             b_Res = false;
00420         }
00421     }
00422 
00423     // Close devices.
00424     if (! CloseDevices())
00425     {
00426         b_Res = false;
00427     }
00428     GetTraces().Trace(TRACE_SHELL) << "Shell for CLI '" << GetCli().GetKeyword() << "' end of run." << endl;
00429 
00430     return b_Res;
00431 }
00432 
00433 const bool Shell::IsRunning(void) const
00434 {
00435     return (m_pcliInput != NULL);
00436 }

00438 const unsigned int Shell::GetHelpMargin(void) const
00439 {
00440     return HELP_MARGIN;

00443 const unsigned int Shell::GetHelpOffset(void) const
00444 {
00445     return HELP_OFFSET;
00446 }
00447 
00448 const bool Shell::OpenDevices(IODevice& CLI_IODevice)
00449 {
00450     GetTraces().Trace(TRACE_SHELL) << "Shell for CLI '" << GetCli().GetKeyword() << "' opening devices." << endl;
00451 
00452     bool b_Res = true;
00453 
00454     // First of all, set references.
00455     {
00456         // Input.
00457         if (m_pcliInput != NULL)
00458         {
00459             m_pcliInput->FreeInstance(__CALL_INFO__);
00460             m_pcliInput = NULL;
00461         }
00462         m_pcliInput = & CLI_IODevice;
00463         m_pcliInput->UseInstance(__CALL_INFO__);
00464 
00465         // Output.
00466         for (int i=0; i<STREAM_TYPES_COUNT; i++)
00467         {
00468             if (m_artStream[i].pcliStream == NULL)
00469             {
00470                 m_artStream[i].pcliStream = & CLI_IODevice;
00471                 m_artStream[i].pcliStream->UseInstance(__CALL_INFO__);
00472             }
00474             m_artStream[i].bEnable = true;
00475         }
00476     }
00477 
00478     // Then open up devices.
00479     {
00480         // Input.
00481         if (m_pcliInput == NULL)
00482         {
00483             CLI_ASSERT(false);
00484             b_Res = false;
00485         }
00486         else if (! m_pcliInput->OpenUp(__CALL_INFO__))
00487         {
00488             PrintError(ResourceString(), m_pcliInput->GetLastError());
00489             b_Res = false;
00490         }
00491 
00492         // Output.
00493         for (int i=0; i<STREAM_TYPES_COUNT; i++)
00494         {
00495             if (m_artStream[i].pcliStream == NULL)
00496             {
00497                 CLI_ASSERT(false);
00498                 b_Res = false;
00499             }
00500             else if (! m_artStream[i].pcliStream->OpenUp(__CALL_INFO__))
00501             {
00502                 PrintError(ResourceString(), m_artStream[i].pcliStream->GetLastError());
00503                 b_Res = false;
00504             }
00505         }
00506     }
00507 
00508     return b_Res;
00509 }
00510 
00511 const bool Shell::CloseDevices(void)
00512 {
00513     GetTraces().Trace(TRACE_SHELL) << "Shell for CLI '" << GetCli().GetKeyword() << "' closing devices." << endl;
00514 
00515     bool b_Res = true;
00516 
00517     // Close down devices.
00518     {
00519         // Output.
00520         for (int i=0; i<STREAM_TYPES_COUNT; i++)
00521         {
00522             if (m_artStream[i].pcliStream == NULL)
00523             {
00524                 CLI_ASSERT(false);
00525                 b_Res = false;
00526             }
00527             else if (! m_artStream[i].pcliStream->CloseDown(__CALL_INFO__))
00528             {
00529                 PrintError(ResourceString(), m_artStream[i].pcliStream->GetLastError());
00530                 b_Res = false;
00531             }
00532         }
00533 
00534         // Input device.
00535         if (m_pcliInput == NULL)
00536         {
00537             CLI_ASSERT(false);
00538             b_Res = false;
00539         }
00540         else if (! m_pcliInput->CloseDown(__CALL_INFO__))
00541         {
00542             PrintError(ResourceString(), m_pcliInput->GetLastError());
00543             b_Res = false;
00544         }
00545     }
00546 
00547     // Unset references.
00548     {
00549         // Output.
00550         for (int i=0; i<STREAM_TYPES_COUNT; i++)
00551         {
00552             if (m_artStream[i].pcliStream == m_pcliInput)
00553             {
00554                 if (! m_artStream[i].pcliStream->FreeInstance(__CALL_INFO__))
00555                 {
00556                     PrintError(ResourceString(), m_artStream[i].pcliStream->GetLastError());
00557                     b_Res = false;
00558                 }
00559                 m_artStream[i].pcliStream = NULL;
00560             }
00561         }
00562 
00563         // Input.
00564         if (m_pcliInput != NULL)
00565         {
00566             if (! m_pcliInput->FreeInstance(__CALL_INFO__))
00567             {
00568                 PrintError(ResourceString(), m_pcliInput->GetLastError());
00569                 b_Res = false;
00570             }
00571             m_pcliInput = NULL;
00572         }
00573     }
00574 
00575     return b_Res;
00576 }
00577 
00578 void Shell::PromptWelcomeMessage(void) const
00579 {
00580     const tk::String str_WelcomeMessage = m_cliWelcomeMessage.GetString(GetLang());
00581     if (! str_WelcomeMessage.IsEmpty())
00582     {
00583         GetStream(WELCOME_STREAM) << str_WelcomeMessage;
00584     }
00585     else
00586     {
00587         GetStream(WELCOME_STREAM)
00588         << "---------------------------------------------------" << endl
00589         << " Welcome to " << GetCli().GetKeyword() << "!" << endl
00590         << endl
00591         << " " << GetCli().GetKeyword() << " is a command line interface" << endl
00592         << " using the CLI library" << endl
00593         << "   (c) Alexis Royer http://alexis.royer.free.fr/CLI/" << endl
00594         << " Type 'help' at any time" << endl
00595         << " or press '?' or TAB to get completion or help." << endl
00596         << "---------------------------------------------------" << endl;
00597     }
00598 }
00599 
00600 void Shell::PromptByeMessage(void) const
00601 {
00602     const tk::String str_ByeMessage = m_cliByeMessage.GetString(GetLang());
00603     if (! str_ByeMessage.IsEmpty())
00604     {
00605         GetStream(WELCOME_STREAM) << str_ByeMessage;
00606     }
00607     else
00608     {
00609         GetStream(WELCOME_STREAM) << "Bye!" << endl;
00610     }
00611 }
00612 
00613 void Shell::PromptMenu(void) const
00614 {
00615     // Show the prompt.
00616     if (! m_qMenus.IsEmpty())
00617     {
00618         const tk::String str_NoDefaultPrompt = m_cliNoDefaultPrompt.GetString(GetLang());
00619         if (! str_NoDefaultPrompt.IsEmpty())
00620         {
00621             GetStream(PROMPT_STREAM) << str_NoDefaultPrompt;
00622         }
00623         else
00624         {
00625             if (const Menu* const pcli_Menu = m_qMenus.GetTail())
00626             {
00627                 GetStream(PROMPT_STREAM) << pcli_Menu->GetKeyword() << ">";
00628             }
00629         }
00630 
00631         // Eventually echo the current line.
00632         m_cliCmdLine.PrintCmdLine(GetStream(ECHO_STREAM));
00633     }
00634 }
00635 
00636 void Shell::PrintError(const ResourceString& CLI_Location, const ResourceString& CLI_ErrorMessage) const
00637 {
00638     // Retrieve error formatting prefix and suffix.
00639     const tk::String str_LocationPrefix = m_cliErrorFormatting[0].GetString(GetLang());
00640     const tk::String str_ErrorPrefix = m_cliErrorFormatting[1].GetString(GetLang());
00641     const tk::String str_ErrorSuffix = m_cliErrorFormatting[2].GetString(GetLang());
00642 
00643     // Print out the error.
00644     GetStream(ERROR_STREAM)
00645         << str_LocationPrefix
00646         << CLI_Location.GetString(GetLang())
00647         << str_ErrorPrefix
00648         << CLI_ErrorMessage.GetString(GetLang())
00649         << str_ErrorSuffix
00650         << endl;
00651 }
00652 
00653 void Shell::ExitMenu(void)
00654 {
00655     const tk::String tk_Left = m_cliCmdLine.GetLeft(), tk_Right = m_cliCmdLine.GetRight();
00656     m_cliCmdLine.Reset();
00657     OnExit(false);
00658     m_cliCmdLine.Set(tk_Left, tk_Right);
00659 }
00660 
00661 void Shell::Quit(void)
00662 {
00663     // Remove all menus of the menu stack to let the shell quit.
00664     while (! m_qMenus.IsEmpty())
00665     {
00666         ExitMenu();
00667     }
00668 }
00669 
00670 void Shell::QuitThreadSafe(void)
00671 {
00672     m_eThreadSafeCmd = THREAD_SAFE_QUIT;
00673 }
00674 
00675 void Shell::DisplayHelp(void)
00676 {
00677     if (! m_qMenus.IsEmpty())
00678     {
00679         const tk::String tk_Left = m_cliCmdLine.GetLeft(), tk_Right = m_cliCmdLine.GetRight();
00680         m_cliCmdLine.Reset();
00681         OnHelp(false, true);
00682         m_cliCmdLine.Set(tk_Left, tk_Right);
00683     }
00684 }
00685 
00686 void Shell::PrintWorkingMenu(void)
00687 {
00688     unsigned int i = 0;
00689     for (i=0; i<HELP_MARGIN; i++)
00690     {
00691         GetStream(OUTPUT_STREAM) << " ";
00692     }
00693     for (   tk::Queue<const Menu*>::Iterator it = m_qMenus.GetIterator();
00694             m_qMenus.IsValid(it);
00695             m_qMenus.MoveNext(it))
00696     {
00697         if (const Menu* const pcli_Menu = m_qMenus.GetAt(it))
00698         {
00699             GetStream(OUTPUT_STREAM) << "/" << pcli_Menu->GetKeyword();
00700         }
00701     }
00702     GetStream(OUTPUT_STREAM) << endl;
00703 }
00704 
00705 void Shell::EnterMenu(const Menu& CLI_Menu)
00706 {
00707     if (! m_qMenus.AddTail(& CLI_Menu))
00708     {
00709         ResourceString cli_Error = ResourceString()
00710             .SetString(ResourceString::LANG_EN, tk::String::Concat(MAX_RESOURCE_LENGTH, "Too many menus. Cannot enter '", CLI_Menu.GetName(), "'."))
00711             .SetString(ResourceString::LANG_FR, tk::String::Concat(MAX_RESOURCE_LENGTH, "Trop de menus. Impossible d'entrer dans le menu '", CLI_Menu.GetName(), "'."));
00712         PrintError(
00713             (m_pcliInput != NULL) ? m_pcliInput->GetLocation() : ResourceString(),
00714             cli_Error
00715         );
00716     }
00717     //  PromptMenu();
00718 }
00719 
00720 void Shell::OnKey(const KEY E_KeyCode)
00721 {
00722     // In general, history navigation is lost.
00723     // Except for navigation keys, in history, and within the line.
00724     switch (E_KeyCode)
00725     {
00726     case KEY_UP: case KEY_DOWN: case PAGE_UP: case PAGE_DOWN:
00727     case KEY_BEGIN: case KEY_END: case KEY_LEFT: case KEY_RIGHT:
00728         break;
00729     default:
00730         m_cliHistory.EnableNavigationMemory(false);
00731         break;
00732     }
00733 
00734     switch (E_KeyCode)
00735     {
00736     case KEY_UP:    OnHistory(1);                           break;
00737     case KEY_DOWN:  OnHistory(-1);                          break;
00738     case PAGE_UP:   OnHistory(HISTORY_PAGE);                break;
00739     case PAGE_DOWN: OnHistory(- (signed int) HISTORY_PAGE); break;
00740     case KEY_BEGIN: OnKeyBegin();                           break;
00741     case KEY_END:   OnKeyEnd();                             break;
00742     case KEY_LEFT:  OnKeyLeft();                            break;
00743     case KEY_RIGHT: OnKeyRight();                           break;
00744     case BACKSPACE: OnBackspace();                          break;
00745     case ENTER:     OnExecute();                            break;
00746     case BREAK:
00747     case ESCAPE:    OnEscape();                             break;
00748     case LOGOUT:    OnExit(true);                           break;
00749     case TAB:       OnHelp(true, false);                    break;
00750     case QUESTION:
00751         if (m_cliCmdLine.GetLine().GetChar(m_cliCmdLine.GetLine().GetLength() - 1) == '\\')
00752             OnPrintableChar(E_KeyCode);
00753         else
00754             OnHelp(true, true);
00755         break;
00756     case CLS:       OnCleanScreen();                        break;
00757 
00758     case KEY_a: case KEY_aacute: case KEY_agrave: case KEY_auml: case KEY_acirc:
00759     case KEY_b: case KEY_c: case KEY_ccedil: case KEY_d:
00760     case KEY_e: case KEY_eacute: case KEY_egrave: case KEY_euml: case KEY_ecirc:
00761     case KEY_f: case KEY_g: case KEY_h:
00762     case KEY_i: case KEY_iacute: case KEY_igrave: case KEY_iuml: case KEY_icirc:
00763     case KEY_j: case KEY_k: case KEY_l: case KEY_m: case KEY_n:
00764     case KEY_o: case KEY_oacute: case KEY_ograve: case KEY_ouml: case KEY_ocirc:
00765     case KEY_p: case KEY_q: case KEY_r: case KEY_s: case KEY_t:
00766     case KEY_u: case KEY_uacute: case KEY_ugrave: case KEY_uuml: case KEY_ucirc:
00767     case KEY_v: case KEY_w: case KEY_x: case KEY_y: case KEY_z:
00768 
00769     case KEY_A: case KEY_B: case KEY_C: case KEY_D: case KEY_E: case KEY_F:
00770     case KEY_G: case KEY_H: case KEY_I: case KEY_J: case KEY_K: case KEY_L:
00771     case KEY_M: case KEY_N: case KEY_O: case KEY_P: case KEY_Q: case KEY_R:
00772     case KEY_S: case KEY_T: case KEY_U: case KEY_V: case KEY_W: case KEY_X:
00773     case KEY_Y: case KEY_Z:
00774 
00775     case KEY_0: case KEY_1: case KEY_2: case KEY_3: case KEY_4: case KEY_5:
00776     case KEY_6: case KEY_7: case KEY_8: case KEY_9:
00777 
00778     case PLUS:
00779     case MINUS:
00780     case STAR:
00781     case SLASH:
00782     case LOWER_THAN:
00783     case GREATER_THAN:
00784     case EQUAL:
00785     case PERCENT:
00786 
00787     case SPACE:
00788     case UNDERSCORE:
00789     case AROBASE:
00790     case SHARP:
00791     case AMPERCENT:
00792     case DOLLAR:
00793     case BACKSLASH:
00794     case PIPE:
00795     case TILDE:
00796     case SQUARE:
00797     case EURO:
00798     case POUND:
00799     case MICRO:
00800     case PARAGRAPH:
00801 
00802     case EXCLAMATION:
00803     case COLUMN:
00804     case DOT:
00805     case COMA:
00806     case SEMI_COLUMN:
00807     case QUOTE:
00808     case DOUBLE_QUOTE:
00809 
00810     case OPENING_BRACE:
00811     case CLOSING_BRACE:
00812     case OPENING_CURLY_BRACE:
00813     case CLOSING_CURLY_BRACE:
00814     case OPENING_BRACKET:
00815     case CLOSING_BRACKET:
00816         OnPrintableChar(E_KeyCode);
00817         break;
00818 
00819     default:
00820         // Non managed character. Just ignore.
00821         break;
00822     }
00823 }
00824 
00825 void Shell::OnPrintableChar(const char C_KeyCode)
00826 {
00827     m_cliCmdLine.Put(GetStream(ECHO_STREAM), C_KeyCode);
00828 }

00830 void Shell::OnKeyBegin(void)
00831 {
00832     m_cliCmdLine.Home(GetStream(ECHO_STREAM));
00833 }
00834 
00835 void Shell::OnKeyEnd(void)
00836 {
00837     m_cliCmdLine.End(GetStream(ECHO_STREAM));
00838 }

00840 void Shell::OnKeyLeft(void)
00841 {
00842     if (! m_cliCmdLine.GetLeft().IsEmpty())
00843     {
00844         m_cliCmdLine.MoveCursor(GetStream(ECHO_STREAM), -1);
00845     }
00846     else
00847     {
00848         Beep();
00849     }
00850 }
00851 
00852 void Shell::OnKeyRight(void)
00853 {
00854     if (! m_cliCmdLine.GetRight().IsEmpty())
00855     {
00856         m_cliCmdLine.MoveCursor(GetStream(ECHO_STREAM), 1);
00857     }
00858     else
00859     {
00860         Beep();
00861     }
00862 }

00864 void Shell::OnCleanScreen(void)
00865 {
00866     m_cliCmdLine.NextLine(GetStream(ECHO_STREAM));
00867     m_cliCmdLine.Reset();
00868     GetStream(OUTPUT_STREAM).CleanScreen();
00869     if (! m_qMenus.IsEmpty())
00870     {
00871         PromptMenu();
00872     }
00873 }
00874 
00875 void Shell::OnBackspace(void)
00876 {
00877     if (! m_cliCmdLine.GetLeft().IsEmpty())
00878     {
00879         m_cliCmdLine.Delete(GetStream(ECHO_STREAM), -1);
00880     }
00881     else
00882     {
00883         Beep();
00884     }
00885 }

00887 void Shell::OnEscape(void)
00888 {
00889     m_cliCmdLine.NextLine(GetStream(ECHO_STREAM));
00890     m_cliCmdLine.Reset();
00891     if (! m_qMenus.IsEmpty())
00892     {
00893         PromptMenu();
00894     }
00895 }
00896 
00897 void Shell::OnExit(const bool B_Edition)
00898 {
00899     // Reset the current line if needed.
00900     if (B_Edition)
00901     {
00902         m_cliCmdLine.NextLine(GetStream(ECHO_STREAM));
00903     }
00904 
00905     m_cliCmdLine.Reset();
00906 
00907     if (const Menu* const pcli_Menu = m_qMenus.RemoveTail())
00908     {
00909         pcli_Menu->OnExit();
00910     }
00911     if (B_Edition)
00912     {
00913         PromptMenu();
00914     }
00915 }
00916 
00917 void Shell::OnHelp(const bool B_Edition, const bool B_HelpOnly)
00918 {
00919     if (! m_qMenus.IsEmpty())
00920     {
00921         // Parse the command line.
00922         CommandLine cli_CommandLine;
00923         if (cli_CommandLine.Parse(*m_qMenus.GetTail(), m_cliCmdLine.GetLeft(), false))
00924         {
00925             // Research matching elements.
00926             Element::List cli_Exact(MAX_WORDS_PER_NODE), cli_Elements(MAX_WORDS_PER_NODE);
00927             if (! cli_CommandLine.GetLastElement().FindElements(
00928                     cli_Exact, cli_Elements, cli_CommandLine.GetLastWord()))
00929             {
00930                 return;
00931             }
00932 
00933             // Initialize completion so far.
00934             tk::String str_CompletionSoFar(MAX_WORD_LENGTH);
00935             // Determine whether help should be printed, and completion activated.
00936             bool b_PrintHelpList = false;
00937 
00938             if (B_HelpOnly)
00939             {
00940                 // Just print help.
00941                 b_PrintHelpList = true;
00942             }
00943             else
00944             {
00945                 // Print help and do completion depending on the possible nodes.
00946                 if (cli_Elements.IsEmpty())
00947                 {
00948                     // No matching element.
00949                     Beep();
00950                 }
00951                 else if ((cli_Elements.GetCount() == 1)
00952                         && (! dynamic_cast<const Endl*>(cli_Elements.GetHead()))
00953                         && (! dynamic_cast<const Param*>(cli_Elements.GetHead())))
00954                 {
00955                     // Straight forward completion.
00956                     m_cliCmdLine.Delete(GetStream(ECHO_STREAM), - cli_CommandLine.GetNumBackspacesForCompletion());
00957                     m_cliCmdLine.Put(GetStream(ECHO_STREAM), cli_Elements.GetHead()->GetKeyword());
00958                     m_cliCmdLine.Put(GetStream(ECHO_STREAM), ' ');
00959                 }
00960                 else
00961                 {
00962                     // Look for completion so far.
00963                     bool b_InitCompletionSoFar = true;
00964                     for (   Element::List::Iterator it = cli_Elements.GetIterator();
00965                             cli_Elements.IsValid(it);
00966                             cli_Elements.MoveNext(it))
00967                     {
00968                         if (dynamic_cast<const Param*>(cli_Elements.GetAt(it))
00969                             || dynamic_cast<const Endl*>(cli_Elements.GetAt(it)))
00970                         {
00971                             // No completion for parameters and end of lines.
00972                             str_CompletionSoFar.Set("");
00973                             break;
00974                         }
00975                         else if (const Element* const pcli_Element = dynamic_cast<const Element*>(cli_Elements.GetAt(it)))
00976                         {
00977                             if (b_InitCompletionSoFar)
00978                             {
00979                                 // First initialization of str_CompletionSoFar.
00980                                 if (! str_CompletionSoFar.Set(pcli_Element->GetKeyword()))
00981                                     GetTraces().Trace(INTERNAL_ERROR) << "Shell::OnHelp(): Could not store completion so far" << endl;
00982                                 b_InitCompletionSoFar = false;
00983                             }
00984                             else
00985                             {
00986                                 // Remove last character of str_CompletionSoFar till it matches the current keyword.
00987                                 while ( (! str_CompletionSoFar.IsEmpty())
00988                                         && (pcli_Element->GetKeyword().SubString(0, str_CompletionSoFar.GetLength()) != str_CompletionSoFar))
00989                                 {
00990                                     if (! str_CompletionSoFar.Set(str_CompletionSoFar.SubString(0, str_CompletionSoFar.GetLength() - 1)))
00991                                         GetTraces().Trace(INTERNAL_ERROR) << "Shell::OnHelp(): Could not store completion so far" << endl;
00992                                 }
00993                             }
00994                         }
00995                     }
00996 
00997                     // When no more completion so far available, print help.
00998                     if ((cli_CommandLine.GetLastWord() == NULL)
00999                         || (str_CompletionSoFar == cli_CommandLine.GetLastWord()))
01000                     {
01001                         b_PrintHelpList = true;
01002                     }
01003                 }
01004             }
01005 
01006             // Help display.
01007             if (b_PrintHelpList)
01008             {
01009                 // First of all, sort help elements on keywords.
01010                 class _ { public:
01011                     static const int cmp(const Element* const& PCLI_1, const Element* const& PCLI_2)
01012                     {
01013                         if (PCLI_1->GetKeyword() < PCLI_2->GetKeyword())
01014                             return 1;
01015                         if (PCLI_1->GetKeyword() > PCLI_2->GetKeyword())
01016                             return -1;
01017                         return 0;
01018                     }
01019                 };
01020                 cli_Elements.Sort(_::cmp);
01021 
01022                 if (B_Edition)
01023                 {
01024                     m_cliCmdLine.NextLine(GetStream(ECHO_STREAM));
01025                 }
01026 
01027                 // For each matching keyword...
01028                 for (   Element::List::Iterator it = cli_Elements.GetIterator();
01029                         cli_Elements.IsValid(it);
01030                         cli_Elements.MoveNext(it))
01031                 {
01032                     // Print the corresponding help.
01033                     PrintHelp(*cli_Elements.GetAt(it));
01034                 }
01035 
01036                 if (B_Edition)
01037                 {
01038                     PromptMenu();
01039                 }
01040             }
01041             // Completion so far.
01042             else if ((! B_HelpOnly) && (! str_CompletionSoFar.IsEmpty()))
01043             {
01044                 m_cliCmdLine.Delete(GetStream(ECHO_STREAM), - cli_CommandLine.GetNumBackspacesForCompletion());
01045                 m_cliCmdLine.Put(GetStream(ECHO_STREAM), str_CompletionSoFar);
01046             }
01047         }
01048         else
01049         {
01050             if (B_Edition)
01051             {
01052                 m_cliCmdLine.NextLine(GetStream(ECHO_STREAM));
01053             }
01054             PrintError(
01055                 (m_pcliInput != NULL) ? m_pcliInput->GetLocation() : ResourceString(),
01056                 cli_CommandLine.GetLastError()
01057             );
01058             if (B_Edition)
01059             {
01060                 PromptMenu();
01061             }
01062         }
01063     }
01064 
01065 }
01066 
01067 void Shell::OnExecute(void)
01068 {
01069     m_cliCmdLine.NextLine(GetStream(ECHO_STREAM));
01070 
01071     if (! m_qMenus.IsEmpty())
01072     {
01073         // First of all, store the line in history stack.
01074         m_cliHistory.Push(m_cliCmdLine);
01075 
01076         // Append "\n" to the line and parse it.
01077         tk::String str_Line(MAX_CMD_LINE_LENGTH + 1);
01078         CommandLine cli_CommandLine;
01079         if (str_Line.Set(m_cliCmdLine.GetLine()) && str_Line.Append("\n")
01080             && cli_CommandLine.Parse(*m_qMenus.GetTail(), str_Line, true))
01081         {
01082             bool b_Executed = false;
01083             // No need to execute unless there are at least one word and one endl elements in the command line.
01084             CommandLineIterator it(cli_CommandLine);
01085             if (it.StepIt() && it.StepIt())
01086             {
01087                 // Command line execution.
01088                 if (const Menu* const pcli_Menu = m_qMenus.GetTail())
01089                 {
01090                     if (pcli_Menu->ExecuteReserved(cli_CommandLine))
01091                         b_Executed = true;
01092                     if (pcli_Menu->Execute(cli_CommandLine))
01093                         b_Executed = true;
01094                 }
01095 
01096                 // Post-execution.
01097                 if (b_Executed)
01098                 {
01099                     // Entering a sub-menu.
01100                     if (const Endl* pcli_Endl = dynamic_cast<const Endl*>(& cli_CommandLine.GetLastElement()))
01101                     {
01102                         if (pcli_Endl->GetMenuRef() != NULL)
01103                         {
01104                             EnterMenu(pcli_Endl->GetMenuRef()->GetMenu());
01105                         }
01106                     }
01107                 }
01108                 else
01109                 {
01110                     const ResourceString cli_ExecutionError = ResourceString()
01111                         .SetString(ResourceString::LANG_EN, "Execution error")
01112                         .SetString(ResourceString::LANG_FR, "Erreur d'excution");
01113                     PrintError(
01114                         (m_pcliInput != NULL) ? m_pcliInput->GetLocation() : ResourceString(),
01115                         cli_ExecutionError
01116                     );
01117                 }
01118             }
01119         }
01120         else
01121         {
01122             PrintError(
01123                 (m_pcliInput != NULL) ? m_pcliInput->GetLocation() : ResourceString(),
01124                 cli_CommandLine.GetLastError()
01125             );
01126         }
01127         m_cliCmdLine.Reset();
01128         PromptMenu();
01129     }
01130 }
01131 
01132 void Shell::OnHistory(const int I_Navigation)
01133 {
01134     if (! m_cliHistory.Navigate(m_cliCmdLine, GetStream(ECHO_STREAM), I_Navigation))
01135     {
01136         // Out of stack.
01137         Beep();
01138     }
01139 }
01140 
01141 void Shell::PrintHelp(const Element& CLI_Element)
01142 {
01143     // Retrieve basic information.
01144     tk::String str_Keyword = CLI_Element.GetKeyword();
01145     tk::String str_Help = CLI_Element.GetHelp().GetString(GetLang());
01146 
01147     // Optional corrections.
01148     if (dynamic_cast<const Endl*>(& CLI_Element))
01149     {
01150         str_Keyword.Set("<cr>");
01151     }
01152     else if (const Param* const pcli_Param = dynamic_cast<const Param*>(& CLI_Element))
01153     {
01154         if (const Param* const pcli_Clone = pcli_Param->Clone())
01155         {
01156             pcli_Clone->SetstrValue("");
01157             if (! str_Keyword.Set(pcli_Clone->GetKeyword()))
01158                 GetTraces().Trace(INTERNAL_ERROR) << "Shell::PrintHelp(): Could not review str_Keyword for the parameter" << endl;
01159             if (! pcli_Param->GetstrValue().IsEmpty())
01160             {
01161                 if (! str_Keyword.Append("("))
01162                     GetTraces().Trace(INTERNAL_ERROR) << "Shell::PrintHelp(): Could not review str_Keyword for the parameter" << endl;
01163                 if (! str_Keyword.Append(pcli_Param->GetstrValue()))
01164                     GetTraces().Trace(INTERNAL_ERROR) << "Shell::PrintHelp(): Could not review str_Keyword for the parameter" << endl;
01165                 if (! str_Keyword.Append(")"))
01166                     GetTraces().Trace(INTERNAL_ERROR) << "Shell::PrintHelp(): Could not review str_Keyword for the parameter" << endl;
01167             }
01168             delete pcli_Clone;
01169         }
01170     }
01171 
01172     // Display.
01173     unsigned int i = 0;
01174     for (i = 0; i < HELP_MARGIN; i++)
01175     {
01176         GetStream(OUTPUT_STREAM) << " ";
01177     }
01178     GetStream(OUTPUT_STREAM) << str_Keyword << " ";
01179     for (i = str_Keyword.GetLength(); i < HELP_OFFSET; i++)
01180     {
01181         GetStream(OUTPUT_STREAM) << " ";
01182     }
01183     GetStream(OUTPUT_STREAM) << str_Help;
01184     GetStream(OUTPUT_STREAM) << endl;
01185 }
01186 
01187 void Shell::Beep(void)
01188 {
01189     if (m_bBeep)
01190     {
01191         GetStream(ERROR_STREAM).Beep();
01192     }
01193 }
